name: Anissa

physical_specifications.build: Athletic and powerful — lean but muscular frame with broad shoulders, sculpted thighs, and toned arms. Hourglass proportions emphasized by a narrow waist and defined hips. 95% accurate to the reference body in attached image.
physical_specifications.posture: Confident, upright stance; hands often on hips in commanding pose.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Balanced torso-to-leg ratio, long muscular legs and arms with visible definition while maintaining feminine curves.

facial_structure.face_shape: Oval with high cheekbones and a defined but feminine jawline.
facial_structure.jawline: Strong but softened by natural contouring.
facial_structure.cheekbones: High and pronounced, creating a sharp, striking profile.
facial_structure.chin: Slightly pointed, proportionate to the face.
facial_structure.nose: Straight, medium bridge with soft definition.
facial_structure.mouth: Full lips with natural pink tone, subtle gloss.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Warm light tan (HEX #D6A77A) with golden undertone.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Smooth, lightly sun-kissed with natural glow.

eyes.brows: Dark, thick, and arched; expressive and defined.

hair.length_cut: Short, layered cut just above the jawline.
hair.style: Tousled, wind-swept style with natural volume.
hair.texture: Thick and healthy with subtle waves.

makeup.eyes: Subtle eyeliner with soft mascara for intensity.
makeup.skin: Light natural foundation with matte finish, faint blush contour.

costume.material: Form-fitted stretch composite with subtle sheen — reinforced fabric for durability, tailored for elegance and combat mobility.
costume.primary_color: Pure white (HEX #F5F5F5) covering torso, sleeves, and skirt panels.
costume.secondary_color: Light silver-grey (HEX #C0C0C0) forming chest emblem, waist trim, and shoulder highlights.
costume.accent_color: Muted steel (HEX #8A8A8A) outlining seams and gloves.
costume.design: High-neck white bodysuit with skirt extension; fitted long sleeves with structured shoulders. 98% accurate to first reference image.
costume.boots: White thigh-high boots with reinforced soles and silver-grey trim.
costume.gloves: White fitted gloves integrated into sleeves, seamless look.

lighting_behavior: Suit reflects bright highlights in daylight; maintains crisp white appearance under artificial light. Hair gains soft shine in backlight, eyes intensify with catch-light.

char_spec.movement_gestures: Hands on hips stance; slow controlled strides; subtle head tilt when assessing someone; deliberate arm movements that emphasize strength.

voice_style.timbre: Feminine, strong, assertive with a commanding presence.
voice_style.articulation: Sharp and precise enunciation with slight edge.
voice_style.reference_line: Strength is not a choice — it is who we are.

char_spec.instruction: Ultra-Realistic Character — maintain Anissa’s form-fitted white/grey costume. Ensure physique is athletic, muscular but feminine (see reference image).

references.description: Full body reference showing costume and physique.
